question:
A private company is faced with the problem of setting up a cement plant. Which of the factors given below should be taken into consideration for this venture?
(1) Abundant electricity
(2) Abundant limestone/dolomite
(3) Abundant labour force
(4) Abundant gas
(5) Accessibility to transportation
(6) Abundant coal
Choose the correct answer from the codes given below:
explanation: Cement grade limestone deposit is very first requirements for setting up cement industry. Apart from this ease of getting electricity for crushers, corrective raw materials, logistic support for dispatch and of course market potential for your cement.
